synopsis.text: Claymation series centers around a unique community of creatures known as 'housnails,' a delightful blend of houses and snails. The story revolves around Jam, a young housnail attending elementary school, and his fellow housnail friends who inhabit a charming village. The housnails are fascinating beings, with houses complete with roofs and windows resting on their backs. This captivating series was featured on NHK Educational's Petit Petit Anime corner, providing an entertaining and educational experience for viewers. Join Jam and his friends as they navigate through the adventures of their quaint and enchanting world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
